lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank is preparing for a potential capital increase of about 8 billion euros ($8.5 billion) as it seeks to strengthen its balance sheet and free up funds for strategic investments after years of restructuring.

headline.main: Paper Apologizes for Column Tying Peterson Case to Slavery
